abort.not_insteon_device: Discovered device not an Insteon device

confirm_usb.description: Do you want to set up {name}?

error.input_error: Invalid entries, please check your values.

data.steps: Dimmer steps (for light devices only, default 22)

change_hub_config.description: Change the Insteon Hub connection information.

change_plm_config.description: Change the Insteon PLM connection information.

data.address: Select a device address to remove

add_all_link.description: Tells the Insteon Modem (IM) start All-Linking mode. Once the IM is in All-Linking mode, press the link button on the device to complete All-Linking.

mode.description: Linking mode of the Insteon Modem.
mode.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::mode%]

add_all_link.name: Add All-Link

add_default_links.description: Adds the default links between the device and the Insteon Modem (IM).
add_default_links.name: Add default links

delete_all_link.description: Tells the Insteon Modem (IM) to remove an All-Link record from the All-Link database of the IM and a device. Once the IM is set to delete the link, press the link button on the corresponding device to complete the process.
delete_all_link.name: Delete All-Link

load_all_link_database.description: Loads the All-Link database for a device. WARNING - Loading a device All-Link database is very time consuming and inconsistent. This may take a LONG time and may need to be repeated to obtain all records.

entity_id.description: Name of the device to load. Use "all" to load the database of all devices.
entity_id.name: Entity

reload.description: If enabled, all current records are cleared from memory (does not affect the device) and reloaded. Otherwise the existing records are left in place and only missing records are added.
reload.name: [%key:common::action::reload%]

load_all_link_database.name: Load All-Link database

print_all_link_database.description: Prints the All-Link database for a device. Requires that the All-Link database is loaded into memory.

entity_id.description: Name of the device to print.
entity_id.name: Entity

print_all_link_database.name: Print All-Link database

print_im_all_link_database.description: Prints the All-Link database for the INSTEON Modem (IM).
print_im_all_link_database.name: Print IM All-Link database

scene_off.description: Triggers an INSTEON scene to turn OFF.
scene_off.name: Scene off

scene_on.description: Triggers an INSTEON scene to turn ON.
scene_on.name: Scene on
